result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael N. MALCHEK

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
State moves to dismiss and read in all counts.  The defendant plead to charges in 14 CF 97, 14 CF 156, 14 CF 157 and 14 CF 203.  Motion granted.
Minutes.

The Court hereby orders that the personal recognizance bond in this case be modified as follows:  the condition that the defendant must report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department daily by 12:00 noon and the defendant must submit to random drug test at his own expense within 7 days of test, is removed as a condition.  Defendant is currently on probation hold for Kewaunee County case no: 14 CF 41.
Copy of order delivered to jail.

Settlement Conference Summary.
Plea hearing is set for 11-10-14 at 1:30 p.m.
Plea Hearing scheduled for 11-10-2014 @ 1:30 p.m. BR-3.

The court hereby orders that condition of bail requiring daily jail report be changed from by noon everyday to by 4:30 p.m. everyday.  
Copy of order delivered to Sheriff.

Settlement Conference w/ DA scheduled for 09-26-2014 @ 9:30 a.m.
Cancellation of Plea Hearing 08-01-2014.

Settlement Conference Summary.
Next Settlement Conference w/ DA is set for 09-26-2014 @ 9:30 a.m.

Settlement Conference Summary.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is reset to 07-22-14 at 10:30 a.m.
Plea Hearing scheduled for 08-01-2014 @ 10:00 a.m. BR-3.
Defendant's Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for further proceedings.   Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.   
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.  Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 05-28-14 at 11:30 a.m.  State's Motino and Demand for Discovery.   Bail is set at $750.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that defendant must report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department daily by 12:00 noon and defendant must submit to random drug test at his own expense within 7 days of test.   Bail furnished.   
Minutes.
